00317 typedef struct ser_async_t
00318 {
00321     signed long           forget;
00322 
00324     SER_CALLBACKROUTINE_T *callback_routine;
00325 
00327     void                  *callback_context;
00328 } SER_ASYNC_T;
00329 
00330 
00332 #define SER_ASYNC_GET_RESULT(async, context) \
00333     { (async)->forget = 0;                     \
00334       (async)->callback_context = (context); }
00335 
00337 #define SER_ASYNC_FORGET(async) \
00338     { (async)->forget = 1; \
00339       (async)->callback_routine = NULL; }
00340 
00343 #define SER_ASYNC_CALLBACK(async, routine, context) \
00344     { (async)->forget = 1; \
00345       (async)->callback_routine = routine; \
00346       (async)->callback_context = context; }
00347
